author: hwright
msg: If we encounter an error while in an SQLite savepoint, back out the work
before returning.  This mirrors the behavior as seen in an SQLite transaction.
(svn_sqlite__with_lock): If the callback function returns an error, rollback

author: todd
msg: HDFS-1731. Allow using a file to exclude certain tests from build. Contributed by Todd Lipcon.

author: jitendra
msg: HADOOP-6912. Guard against NPE when calling UGI.isLoginKeytabBased(). Contributed by Kan Zhang.

msg: Merging r1066985:r1066986 and r1066970 from trunk to federation
